name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time Timer Mod for chrome extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check your timer while using chrome browser. Don't waste your precious time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will assist you in your productive browser activities. Try using this extension while web surfing or watching YouTube videos. Visualize your break time to better manage your productivity. Utilize it for more efficient time management! Don't waste your precious time.

**NOTICE
This extension is in "BETA" version. We kindly request any feedback, including unexpected errors, bugs, or any other comments, to be sent via email. We will promptly work on updating and uploading a new version based on your feedback. Your input is highly valued, and we look forward to hearing from you. We aim to release the new version as soon as possible. Thank you for your support and cooperation!
**
